#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	
	int n, k;
	int x;
	int i, j;
	double v = 0;
	long long ans = 0, v_t;
	int a[1002];
	
	scanf("%d%d", &k, &n);
	
	for(i = 0; i < k; i++) {
		
		scanf("%d", &a[i]);
		v = v + 1.0 / a[i];
	}
	
	ans = ceil(n / v);
	
	while (1) {
		v_t = 0;
		for(i = 0; i < k; i++) {
			v_t = v_t + ans / a[i];
		}
		
		if(v_t >= n) {
			
			break;
			
		} else {
			
			ans++;
			
		}
		
	}
	
	cout << ans << endl;
	
	return 0;
	
}
